content:
Hello, I am a FHIR researcher from Korea.
I just saw the ppt https://www.slideshare.net/DevDays/fhir-search-for-clients-mirjam and have a question about _revinclude.
As I understood, if I try GET [base] / Patient ? _revinclude=Observation:subject, the result is a searchset bundle having patient resources and Observation resources whose subjects refer the patient resources meeting the search criteria. But I cannot find any test server to test _revinclude.
I would like to ask whether what I understand is correct, and any test server to test _revinclude with sample queries.
Thank you in advance
Best
Joonggeon Lee

Your understanding is correct. I believe the healthintersections.com.au server works (be sure you're testing the STU 3 version). That said, the query you're making is a dangerous one. A given patient may have thousands or tens of thousands of observations. So if you execute the search and set a page size of 50 patients, you could easily get back 500k Observations in your first page. (And you may find that some servers will therefore refuse to perform the query)
I don't support _revinclude yet. I think the HAPI server does
